DOC.brief_summary: In this trial, the effect of a low and a high dose AN-PEP will be investigated in gluten sensitive individuals. Volunteers receive a breakfast with background (0.5 g) gluten. Capsules are taken in the morning within 5 min after start of breakfast. Gastrointestinal fluid will be sampled over 3 hours to measure gluten degradation. After 5 volunteers have completed 3 test days, a blind interim analysis is performed by a third party based on which it is decided whether to proceed with the low AN-PEP dose.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of AN-PEP Enzyme on Gluten Digestion in Gluten Sensitive Individuals
